from follow fo, user_info ui
where fo.userid = ui.userid
and fo.CreateTime between
str_to_date(?, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and str_to_date(?, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')

and ui.UserState = 0
